name: attraction inquiry
description: Assist user in finding an attraction to visit based on search constraints.

processes.name: Prompt for search constraints
processes.description: Request user to provide search constraints if not specified.
process: Reply: 'Please provide the area, attraction type, or name to start your search.'

processes.name: Query attraction by name
processes.description: Retrieve attraction details when a specific name is provided.
process: Action: Use Attraction Query tool with the exact input format 'name: [user-provided name]'
Reply: '[attraction name] is a [type] located at [address] with contact [phone].'

processes.name: Query and recommend attractions
processes.description: Search and suggest attractions based on user constraints.
process: Action: Use Attraction Query tool with the exact input format 'area: [area], type: [type]'
Reply: 'I found these attractions: [names]. Which would you like to visit?'
